attributes.action: Enid Blyton should have a plaque in her honour
attributes.additional_details: I am only a young girl aged 9. I have never done this before but I am doing what I think is right. I have started a petition for Enid Blyton. She is an author who has inspired me to read. But my Granny told me people have refused to give her a memorial in her home town. So please sign my petition and I will be forever grateful.
